name: Crunchy Beef-Noodle Bake
author: Donna Menz
instructions: Cook ground beef and onion in 10 inch skillet, stirring frequently until beef is brown; drain. Stir in remaining ingredients except cheese, noodles, and nuts. Pour into ungreased 2 quart casserole. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and bake 50 minutes at 350°. Top with noodles and nuts. Bake uncovered for 10 minutes. To serve later: cover and refrigerate up to 24 hours. Bake uncovered in 350° for 50 minutes. Top with noodles and nuts. Bake uncovered 10 minutes.
